FARE.summary: World Moto, Inc. designs, manufactures, markets, and sells moto-meter products and services primarily in Thailand. Its principal product is the moto-meter, which provides moto-taxi fare metering and other communication capabilities. The company also develops moto-meter related smartphone application, which connects directly to the moto-meter through a secure Bluetooth connection and can access real-time data from the moto-meter, and enables customers to view driver profiles and ratings before getting on a motorcycle taxi. In addition, it develops Yes, a concierge service that enables persons to order products and have them delivered to their address by motor scooter; and HailYes, an integrated mobile platform, which instantly connects consumers to transport and commerce services in a local community, as well as Wheelies, an advertising product that displays static and streaming media on the wheels of motorcycles and automobiles. The company markets its products through social media, direct sales, and trade shows. World Moto, Inc. is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

FPI.BK.long_name: Fortune Parts Industry Public Company Limited
FPI.BK.summary: Fortune Parts Industry Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes automotive replacement parts in Thailand, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, and internationally. The company operates in three segments: Domestic Sales, Export Sales, and Services. It offers plastic injection parts, such as grilles, bumpers, H/L doors, valance panels, side bumpers and corners, and other plastic parts; and lamp and mirror parts, including head, corner, tail, side, front, reflector tail, and fog lamps, as well as automotive mirrors. The company also provides metal stamping parts comprising stampings for fenders, hoods, radiator supports, valance panels, doors, tail gates, roll bars, front guards, and bumpers; coolant parts, such as radiators, condensers, evaporators, and inter coolers; and suspension parts, including center bearings, engine mountings, bushings, ball joints, shock absorbers, and upper and lower arms. In addition, it offers engine and brake parts, including disc brake pads, brake shoes and wheels, water pumps, starters, and alternators; and cables and hoses comprising accelerator, speedometer, hand brake, clutch, and hook lock control cables, as well as brake, fuel, and hydraulic hoses. Further, the company provides mold design and making services; plastic injection molding services; plastic chrome plating services; and plastic painting, finishing, and assembly services, as well as dipping services. Its products are primarily used in pick-up vehicles, trucks, and passenger cars. Fortune Parts Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1991 and is based in Lam Luk Ka, Thailand.

GYT-R.BK.summary: Goodyear (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures, distributes, and sells motor vehicle and aero tires in Thailand. The company also exports its products. The company was incorporated in 1968 and is headquartered in Pathumthani, Thailand. Goodyear (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of The Goodyear Tire & Rubber Company.

GYT.BK.summary: Goodyear (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures, distributes, and sells motor vehicle and aero tires in Thailand. The company also exports its products. The company was incorporated in 1968 and is headquartered in Pathumthani, Thailand. Goodyear (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of The Goodyear Tire & Rubber Company.

HFT-R.BK.long_name: Hwa Fong Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited
HFT-R.BK.summary: Hwa Fong Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes tires and inner tubes in Thailand, rest of Asia, Europe, the United States, and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Sale of Goods and Investment. It offers tires and tubes for bicycles, motorcycles, and small logistics vehicles. The company markets its products under the DUNLOP, DURO, Q-UICK, and PREMIUM HFT brands. It is also involved in investing in bonds and securities; and the wholesale and retail trade of tires and tubes, and equipment for vehicles. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Samutprakarn, Thailand. Hwa Fong Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Hwa Fong Rubber Industries Company Limited.

HFT.BK.long_name: Hwa Fong Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited
HFT.BK.summary: Hwa Fong Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes tires and inner tubes in Thailand, rest of Asia, Europe, the United States, and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Sale of Goods and Investment. It offers tires and tubes for bicycles, motorcycles, and small logistics vehicles. The company markets its products under the DUNLOP, DURO, Q-UICK, and PREMIUM HFT brands. It is also involved in investing in bonds and securities; and the wholesale and retail trade of tires and tubes, and equipment for vehicles. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Samutprakarn, Thailand. Hwa Fong Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Hwa Fong Rubber Industries Company Limited.

IHL-R.BK.summary: Interhides Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes leather coverings for car seats and other related products in Thailand, China, Japan, Vietnam, Indonesia, Malaysia, England, and internationally. It offers finished leather products, cut parts, and trim covers for use in car seats, steering wheels, gear knobs, and safety shoes. The company also provides spray and tanning services; and bleaching, dyeing finishing, and other services. In addition, it manufactures and distributes hydrolyzed protein from leather scrap; and dog chew products. The company also exports its products. It primarily serves the automotive industry, as well as furniture makers, dog chew makers, etc. The company was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

IHL.BK.summary: Interhides Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes leather coverings for car seats and other related products in Thailand, China, Japan, Vietnam, Indonesia, Malaysia, England, and internationally. It offers finished leather products, cut parts, and trim covers for use in car seats, steering wheels, gear knobs, and safety shoes. The company also provides spray and tanning services; and bleaching, dyeing finishing, and other services. In addition, it manufactures and distributes hydrolyzed protein from leather scrap; and dog chew products. The company also exports its products. It primarily serves the automotive industry, as well as furniture makers, dog chew makers, etc. The company was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

INGRS-R.BK.summary: Ingress Industrial (Thailand) Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacture and distribution of automotive components in Thailand, Malaysia, Indonesia, and India. The company offers roll forming products, such as door sashes, glass guides, bellows, and EGR and collapsible pipes, as well as beltline, roof drip, and windshield; stamping products, including module assembly, side structures, under body, heat protector, brake plates, door hinges, and other products; and tool making and automation solutions. It also provides engineering and automatic production system design services. The company was incoporated in 2014 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Ingress Industrial (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Ingress Corporation Berhad.

INGRS.BK.summary: Ingress Industrial (Thailand) Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacture and distribution of automotive components in Thailand, Malaysia, Indonesia, and India. The company offers roll forming products, such as door sashes, glass guides, bellows, and EGR and collapsible pipes, as well as beltline, roof drip, and windshield; stamping products, including module assembly, side structures, under body, heat protector, brake plates, door hinges, and other products; and tool making and automation solutions. It also provides engineering and automatic production system design services. The company was incoporated in 2014 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Ingress Industrial (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Ingress Corporation Berhad.

IRC-R.BK.summary: Inoue Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited engages in the research, development, manufacture, and distribution of motorcycle tires and tubes in Thailand and internationally. The company also provides industrial elastomer rubber parts, including rubber bushing, railway rubber, housing gasket, rubber chip, grommet, rubber level crossing, hole protection, covers, cushion rubber, rubber protector, trim bonnet rear, and rubber isolator for sport track, agriculture and fishery, infrastructure project, construction, and other industries. It also offers automotive elastomer products, such as hose air intake, socket covers, lamp and lens gasket, door and front grommets, column hole/cover assy-hole, weather strip inner and hood, shield fuel tank, gauge oil level, door stoppers, trunk lids, weather strip front window, rubber strap and mirror, and plug for automotive industry; and cover rubbers, socket body products, rubber seats, grommets, guide chains, chain guards, vale comp inlets, rollers, sprockets, O-ring, float, pealing fuel, and rubber bushes for motorcycle industry. In addition, the company provides cooling machine rubber cushions for electrical appliances, construction material, container seals, and other products. Further, it manufactures, repairs, and modifies metal molds and equipment for the production of motorcycle tires, tubes, and automotive rubber parts. The company also exports its products. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

IRC.BK.summary: Inoue Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited engages in the research, development, manufacture, and distribution of motorcycle tires and tubes in Thailand and internationally. The company also provides industrial elastomer rubber parts, including rubber bushing, railway rubber, housing gasket, rubber chip, grommet, rubber level crossing, hole protection, covers, cushion rubber, rubber protector, trim bonnet rear, and rubber isolator for sport track, agriculture and fishery, infrastructure project, construction, and other industries. It also offers automotive elastomer products, such as hose air intake, socket covers, lamp and lens gasket, door and front grommets, column hole/cover assy-hole, weather strip inner and hood, shield fuel tank, gauge oil level, door stoppers, trunk lids, weather strip front window, rubber strap and mirror, and plug for automotive industry; and cover rubbers, socket body products, rubber seats, grommets, guide chains, chain guards, vale comp inlets, rollers, sprockets, O-ring, float, pealing fuel, and rubber bushes for motorcycle industry. In addition, the company provides cooling machine rubber cushions for electrical appliances, construction material, container seals, and other products. Further, it manufactures, repairs, and modifies metal molds and equipment for the production of motorcycle tires, tubes, and automotive rubber parts. The company also exports its products. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

NC2.SI.long_name: Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited
NC2.SI.summary: Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes natural rubber products in Thailand, China, the United States, Singapore, Japan, and internationally. The company operates in four segments: Natural Rubber Products, Gloves, and Other Businesses. The Natural Rubber Products segment manufactures, sells, and trade in ribbed smoked sheets, concentrated latex, and block rubbers. The Gloves segment manufactures and sells powdered and powderfree latex examination gloves. The Other Businesses segment engages in the plantation activities, such as rubber, palm, trees, and temperate fruits; and manufacture and sale of escalator handrails, rubber injection-moulded goods, and high-pressure hydraulic hoses. This segment also offers engineering services that include research and development of machinery and production processes, as well as information system services; and logistics and other services. It also offers processed rubber wood and medical gloves; and information technology service. Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Hat Yai, Thailand.

NDR-R.BK.summary: N.D. Rubber Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes motorcycle tires and tubes in Thailand and internationally. The company offers street, scooter, and off road tires; motorcycle tubes; and air lock, a replacement to motorcycle tube that retains air pressure of tire on spoke rim. It also manufactures and distributes rubber and synthetic products for automobiles and motorcycles; manufactures and sells automotive rubber parts; distributes batteries for cars, automobiles, and motorcycles, as well as provides related services; and distributes bicycle tires and tubes, and footwear. In addition, the company researches, develops, manufactures, and distributes wireless electrical equipment and systems, and power transmission equipment. N.D. Rubber Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

NDR.BK.summary: N.D. Rubber Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes motorcycle tires and tubes in Thailand and internationally. The company offers street, scooter, and off road tires; motorcycle tubes; and air lock, a replacement to motorcycle tube that retains air pressure of tire on spoke rim. It also manufactures and distributes rubber and synthetic products for automobiles and motorcycles; manufactures and sells automotive rubber parts; distributes batteries for cars, automobiles, and motorcycles, as well as provides related services; and distributes bicycle tires and tubes, and footwear. In addition, the company researches, develops, manufactures, and distributes wireless electrical equipment and systems, and power transmission equipment. N.D. Rubber Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

PACO-R.BK.long_name: President Automobile Industries Public Company Limited
PACO-R.BK.summary: President Automobile Industries Public Company Limited produces and distributes replacement automotive air conditioner spare parts in Asia, North America, Europe, South America, and Australia. The company offers condensers, evaporators, refrigerants, compressors, intercoolers, oil coolers, air conditioning electrical parts, and other accessories. It serves replacement equipment manufacturers and original equipment suppliers. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Krathum Baen, Thailand.

PACO.BK.long_name: President Automobile Industries Public Company Limited
PACO.BK.summary: President Automobile Industries Public Company Limited produces and distributes replacement automotive air conditioner spare parts in Asia, North America, Europe, South America, and Australia. The company offers condensers, evaporators, refrigerants, compressors, intercoolers, oil coolers, air conditioning electrical parts, and other accessories. It serves replacement equipment manufacturers and original equipment suppliers. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Krathum Baen, Thailand.

PCSGH-R.BK.long_name: P.C.S. Machine Group Holding Public Company Limited
PCSGH-R.BK.summary: P.C.S. Machine Group Holding Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes automotive parts and electronic products in Asia, Europe, and internationally. The company provides engine parts, transmission parts, final drives, and others, as well as offers forged steel parts and molds. It also engages rental of properties. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Nakhon Ratchasima, Thailand.

PCSGH.BK.long_name: P.C.S. Machine Group Holding Public Company Limited
PCSGH.BK.summary: P.C.S. Machine Group Holding Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes automotive parts and electronic products in Asia, Europe, and internationally. The company provides engine parts, transmission parts, final drives, and others, as well as offers forged steel parts and molds. It also engages rental of properties. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Nakhon Ratchasima, Thailand.

PSQ.F.long_name: Somboon Advance Technology Public Company Limited
PSQ.F.summary: Somboon Advance Technology Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells pick-up axles and truck trunnion shafts in Thailand. It offers axle shafts, disc and drum brakes, leaf and coil springs, stabilizer bars, exhaust manifolds, hot coil springs, and other products. The company also provides its parts for passenger cars, pick-ups, and trucks, as well as for the agriculture machinery industry. In addition, it rents and invests in real estate. The company serves original equipment manufacturers and replacement equipment manufacturers. Somboon Advance Technology Public Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.

SANKO-R.BK.summary: Sanko Diecasting (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes aluminum products and parts in Thailand and internationally. Its automotive parts include alternators/motor start parts, fan clutches, air compressors, safety belts, pipes, water coolers, wipers, and audio parts, as well as headlamp heatsink parts; motorcycle parts comprise carburetors, clutches, cosmetic, housing, and frame arm parts; electric products consisting of CCTV and camcorders; and electric air and pump parts. The company also offers home decoration products from brass, copper, iron, and aluminum by lost wax casting; and tractors, grass cutters, oil, and air compressor parts, as well as mower assembly and components in agricultural industry. Sanko Diecasting (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.

SANKO.BK.summary: Sanko Diecasting (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes aluminum products and parts in Thailand and internationally. Its automotive parts include alternators/motor start parts, fan clutches, air compressors, safety belts, pipes, water coolers, wipers, and audio parts, as well as headlamp heatsink parts; motorcycle parts comprise carburetors, clutches, cosmetic, housing, and frame arm parts; electric products consisting of CCTV and camcorders; and electric air and pump parts. The company also offers home decoration products from brass, copper, iron, and aluminum by lost wax casting; and tractors, grass cutters, oil, and air compressor parts, as well as mower assembly and components in agricultural industry. Sanko Diecasting (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.

The company serves original equipment manufacturers and replacement equipment manufacturers. Somboon Advance Technology Public Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.

It also offers processed rubber wood and medical gloves; and information technology service. Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Hat Yai, Thailand.

STANLY-R.BK.long_name: Thai Stanley Electric Public Company Limited
STANLY-R.BK.summary: Thai Stanley Electric Public Company Limited manufactures and sells automotive bulbs, lighting equipment, molds and dies, and product designs primarily in Thailand. It offers various automotive lighting products, including head lamps and rear combination lamps; and motorcycle lighting products, such as head combination lamps, wind screens, front winkers, rear combination lamps, and rear winkers. It also manufactures LED and electronic components; and auto parts. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Muang, Thailand.

STANLY.BK.long_name: Thai Stanley Electric Public Company Limited
STANLY.BK.summary: Thai Stanley Electric Public Company Limited manufactures and sells automotive bulbs, lighting equipment, molds and dies, and product designs primarily in Thailand. It offers various automotive lighting products, including head lamps and rear combination lamps; and motorcycle lighting products, such as head combination lamps, wind screens, front winkers, rear combination lamps, and rear winkers. It also manufactures LED and electronic components; and auto parts. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Muang, Thailand.

TKT-R.BK.summary: T.Krungthai Industries Public Company Limited manufactures and sells plastic parts in Thailand. The company also designs, manufactures, sells, and repairs plastic injection molds. It serves automotive, electrical appliance, and packaging industries, as well as original equipment manufacturers. T.Krungthai Industries Public Company Limited was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TKT.BK.summary: T.Krungthai Industries Public Company Limited manufactures and sells plastic parts in Thailand. The company also designs, manufactures, sells, and repairs plastic injection molds. It serves automotive, electrical appliance, and packaging industries, as well as original equipment manufacturers. T.Krungthai Industries Public Company Limited was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TNPC-R.BK.long_name: Thai Nam Plastic Public Company Limited
TNPC-R.BK.summary: Thai Nam Plastic Public Company Limited engages in the production and distribution of flexible plastic, synthetic leather, and car mats in Thailand and internationally. It offers polyvinyl chloride (PVC), foam sheet, PP foam leather, thermoplastic olefin, and rigid PVC. The company also exports its products. Its products have applications in automotive, sports shoes and balls, furniture, leather, civil engineering, and agriculture industries. Thai Nam Plastic Public Company Limited was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Samutsakorn, Thailand.

TNPC.BK.long_name: Thai Nam Plastic Public Company Limited
TNPC.BK.summary: Thai Nam Plastic Public Company Limited engages in the production and distribution of flexible plastic, synthetic leather, and car mats in Thailand and internationally. It offers polyvinyl chloride (PVC), foam sheet, PP foam leather, thermoplastic olefin, and rigid PVC. The company also exports its products. Its products have applications in automotive, sports shoes and balls, furniture, leather, civil engineering, and agriculture industries. Thai Nam Plastic Public Company Limited was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Samutsakorn, Thailand.

TRU-R.BK.short_name: THAI RUNG UNION CAR PUBLIC COMP
TRU-R.BK.long_name: Thai Rung Union Car Public Company Limited
TRU-R.BK.summary: Thai Rung Union Car Public Company Limited engages in the car assembly and modification, and the manufacture and distribution of parts and molds primarily in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Car Assembly and Other Related Car Services; Manufacture of Equipment for Production of Car Accessories; and Sales of Cars, and Car Service Centre Business. It offers tooling products, including dies and molds, and assembly jigs and checking fixtures; auto parts, such as metal stamping and plastic parts; and seats and interior trim products for various motor vehicles. The company also provides contract assembly and sub-assembly services for vehicles, cargo boxes, excavator cabs, etc.; and vehicle modification and painting services. In addition, it is involved in the sale of cars, car accessories, and spare parts; and manufacture of vehicle body parts. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TRU.BK.short_name: THAI RUNG UNION CAR PUBLIC COMP
TRU.BK.long_name: Thai Rung Union Car Public Company Limited
TRU.BK.summary: Thai Rung Union Car Public Company Limited engages in the car assembly and modification, and the manufacture and distribution of parts and molds primarily in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Car Assembly and Other Related Car Services; Manufacture of Equipment for Production of Car Accessories; and Sales of Cars, and Car Service Centre Business. It offers tooling products, including dies and molds, and assembly jigs and checking fixtures; auto parts, such as metal stamping and plastic parts; and seats and interior trim products for various motor vehicles. The company also provides contract assembly and sub-assembly services for vehicles, cargo boxes, excavator cabs, etc.; and vehicle modification and painting services. In addition, it is involved in the sale of cars, car accessories, and spare parts; and manufacture of vehicle body parts. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TSC.BK.long_name: Thai Steel Cable Public Company Limited
TSC.BK.summary: Thai Steel Cable Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes automobile and motorcycle control cables, and automobile window regulators in Thailand. Its products include accelerator, door lock, fuel lid opener, hood release, key inter lock, parking brake, seat belt, transmission, manual parking release, trunk opener, and engine start cables; and motorcycle products comprise brake, clutch, seat lock, speed meter, tachometer, and throttle cables. The company serves automobile and motorcycle manufacturers, and spare parts centers. It also exports its products. Thai Steel Cable Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

UP.BK.summary: Union Plastic Public Company Limited manufactures and sells thermoplastics in Thailand. The company offers various plastic parts, including automotive parts, electrical appliances, household products, and vacuum bottles; and plastic injection molds comprising automotive parts, electrical appliances, painting on plastic parts, and others. It also provides contract manufacturing and repair services for molds; and technical support services, including design assistance, material selection, and packaging concepts. Union Plastic Public Company Limited was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

YTAA.F.long_name: Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited
YTAA.F.summary: Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes natural rubber products in Thailand, China, the United States, Singapore, Japan, and internationally. The company operates in four segments: Natural Rubber Products, Gloves, and Other Businesses. The Natural Rubber Products segment manufactures, sells, and trade in ribbed smoked sheets, concentrated latex, and block rubbers. The Gloves segment manufactures and sells powdered and powderfree latex examination gloves. The Other Businesses segment engages in the plantation activities, such as rubber, palm, trees, and temperate fruits; and manufacture and sale of escalator handrails, rubber injection-moulded goods, and high-pressure hydraulic hoses. This segment also offers engineering services that include research and development of machinery and production processes, as well as information system services; and logistics and other services. It also offers processed rubber wood and medical gloves; and information technology service. Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Hat Yai, Thailand.

YUASA-R.BK.summary: Yuasa Battery (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes batteries for automobiles and motorcycles in Thailand. The company also offers industrial batteries. It markets its products under the YUASA brand name, as well as under private brands, such as THUNDERLITE and YUCON. The company serves original and replacement equipment markets. It also exports its products. The company is headquartered in Samutprakan, Thailand.

YUASA.BK.summary: Yuasa Battery (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes batteries for automobiles and motorcycles in Thailand. The company also offers industrial batteries. It markets its products under the YUASA brand name, as well as under private brands, such as THUNDERLITE and YUCON. The company serves original and replacement equipment markets. It also exports its products. The company is headquartered in Samutprakan, Thailand.
